# A sample Guardfile # More info at github.com/guard/guard#readme

guard ‘rspec’, :version => 2 do 

  watch(%r(^spec/(.*)_spec.rb))
  watch(%r(^lib/(.*)\.rb))        { |m| "spec/#{m[1]}_spec.rb" }
  watch('spec/spec_helper.rb')    { "spec" }

end
